abstract: Bush Theater in London is producing Sixty-Six Books, performance cycle featuring collection of short plays, poems and songs, to commemorate the 400th anniversary of the King James Bible.
snippet: The Bush Theater in London is producing “Sixty-Six Books,” a collection of short plays, poems and songs, to commemorate the 400th anniversary of the King James Bible.
lead_paragraph: The Bush Theater in London is producing “Sixty-Six Books,” a collection of short plays, poems and songs, to commemorate the 400th anniversary of the King James Bible.

headline.main: At London Theater, a Celebration of Biblical Proportions
headline.print_headline: At London Theater, a Celebration of Biblical Proportions
headline.seo: Bush Theater Celebrates King James Bible With ‘Sixty-Six Books’
